title: Not Wanted: Sex Offenders
description: In different states, people are banned from a variety of occupations for offenses as innocuous as public urination or streaking. With this quiz, explore some of the strangest vocational penalties.
teaser: Like quizzes? Guess what these 20 inventions are supposed to do.

questions.content: In Illinois, sex offenders cannot have which of these jobs?
questions.feedback: Other forbidden careers include ice cream truck driver, locksmith, and live-scan technician.

questions.content: In Wisconsin, felony sex offenders are prohibited from doing which of these things?
questions.feedback: Sex offenders are also forbidden from working as behavior analysts, midwives, motorcycle instructors, and "alternative massage" practitioners.

questions.content: In Alaska, felony sex offenders cannot have which of these jobs?
questions.feedback: And this ban on sport fishing guides applies only to the Kenai River.

questions.content: In Pennsylvania, sex offenders cannot have which of these jobs?
questions.feedback: This one's a freebie—offenders are prohibited from all of these jobs. The taxi dispatcher ban, however, applies only to Philadelphia.

questions.content: California may not authorize sex offenders to receive which of the following?
questions.feedback: California sex offenders are also banned from driving wheelchair vans, litter vans, and tow trucks.
